name: Hamza Nouman
title: High School Student | Aspiring Software Engineer | AI & Robotics Enthusiast
summary: A highly motivated and proactive high school student with a profound passion for **Artificial Intelligence**, **backend development**, and **robotics**. Dedicated to building impactful **real-world projects** using modern technologies like **Python**, **Flask**, and **React**. Eager to apply and expand technical skills in dynamic environments, with a strong focus on continuous learning and innovation in AI integration and scalable backend solutions.

academic_background.focus: Science Track – Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Mathematics

professional_experience.description: Engaged in various freelance projects focusing on **backend development**. Key responsibilities included:
responsibilities: Designing and implementing robust **Flask APIs** for web applications.
Integrating **Google Gemini API** to develop intelligent chatbot functionalities and enhance application interactivity.
Managing and structuring **JSON-based knowledge databases** to power dynamic content delivery and AI responses.
Collaborating with front-end developers to ensure seamless API integration.
achievements: Successfully delivered multiple Flask API projects for clients.
Gained hands-on experience in production-level API development and integration.

projects.name: Gemini Chatbot
projects.description: Developed an **AI-powered interactive chatbot** capable of answering specific questions based on a highly **structured JSON résumé file**. This project demonstrates expertise in:
highlights: Seamless integration with the **Google Gemini API** for natural language understanding and generation.
Implementation of a **Flask backend** to serve as the API endpoint.
Creation of a dynamic **React frontend** for user interaction.
Utilizing **JSON for structured data management** to ensure accurate and relevant information retrieval.
Focus on **multilingual response capabilities** and **context-aware Q&A**.

certifications.name: Google AI for Everyone
certifications.description: Completed a foundational course on Artificial Intelligence, covering key concepts of AI, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning, and their real-world applications.

certifications.name: Python for Everybody Specialization
certifications.description: Comprehensive specialization focusing on Python programming, data structures, web data, and databases.

what_im_looking_for: I am actively seeking opportunities to apply and grow my skills in **backend development** and **AI integration**, particularly with Python and Flask. I am eager to contribute to projects that involve complex problem-solving, innovative AI applications, and the development of robust, scalable systems. I am particularly keen to explore opportunities involving **robotics** and **IoT**, like Arduino, as I believe in bridging software with hardware solutions. My goal is to learn from experienced professionals and continuously improve my programming and engineering skills.

goals: Become a proficient Software Engineer specializing in AI/Backend
